title: theruvil vAraanO (padham)
sahitya:
teruvil vArAnO ennai shaTrE tirumbip-pArAnO

anupallavi

uruviliyoDu tripurattaiyum uDan eri sheida naTarAjan

caraNam 1
 
vAsal munnillAnO enakkoru vAcakam shollAnO nEsamAip-pullEnO kazhai
vaitta
rajanai vellEnO dEshikan ambalavANa naTam puri dEvAdi dEvan
cidambaranAthan

caraNam 2

pOdu pOhudillaiyE enakkoru tUdu sholvArillaiyE IdarindEnillaiyE enmEl
kuTram yAdonRumillaiyE
dEvanumAlum mUvAyirarum sUzha viNNa varum tozhavADiya pAdan
